summary: just CME save file. have fun. :D
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][How to Intall][/color][/b]
1. Documents>My Games>Skyrim[color=rgb(255,255,255)]>cme_[/color]save>your download cme file.
[color=#ffff00][color=rgb(255,255,255)]2. choose Race Nord.
3. in the Body type, you can load from slot No 1. -> [color=#cccccc]'slot load'
[/color][/color]
[b][Required][/b][/color]
1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20227/?]TroubleMakers Clothing -UNPB also BBP and BBPx Female body Replacer[/url]
  [color=#b6b6b6] ## install option ##
    -Body(Select one):tick TBBP MTM 2H-TB body
    -Skeletons:tick T-BBP Skeletons
    -Animations:choose you like.
    -Skin Texutres:DON'T select anything. we are use SG Female Texture.[/color]
2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]
3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal UNP[/url]
4. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
5. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27783/?]HN66s Long Eye Lashs[/url]

[color=#00ff00][b][Optional][/b][/color]
1. SG Hair Pack 268 by HelloSanta. [color=#999999](I belive your googling. :P)[/color]
2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29791/?]No more Ugly Bronze Shine[/url]
3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat[/url] [color=#b6b6b6](UNP version)[/color]
4. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] [color=#b6b6b6](recommand)

[/color][youtube]hP0yNicHHsk[/youtube]
author: ELSID
